statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ 0 \\ 4 \\ 9 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 9 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ 0 \\ 4 \\ 9 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
